models.name: creverse_ai_essay_rubric_templates
models.description: Defines rubric templates as the blueprint for essay grading rubrics owned by tenants. They consist of metadata including tenant reference, name, language, scope, and timestamps. These templates are managed independently by users and serve as the basis for immutable rubric versions.

plainFields.description: Timestamp of last rubric template update.

models.description: Represents immutable rubric versions created from templates. foreignFields.description: Foreign key to rubric criterion. {@link creverse_ai_essay_rubric_criteria.id}

models.description: Contains essay submissions representing individual essays submitted by students within tenants and classes. Links to tenant, student, and optionally class. plainFields.description: Inclusive end character offset of the matched text in the source

plainFields.name: matched_text
plainFields.description: Extracted matched text snippet for audit display

plainFields.name: created_at

plainFields.name: updated_at

models.name: creverse_ai_essay_ocr_jobs
models.description: OCR ingestion jobs represent asynchronous requests to convert essay blobs such as PDFs or images into text. Each job is uniquely identified by a UUID and associated with a tenant and a source essay blob. The model tracks the OCR processing lifecycle through status fields, optional error messages for diagnostics, start and finish timestamps, and usual created, updated, and soft deletion timestamps. The entity serves as a primary domain object reflecting OCR processing pipeline states independent from essay or grading workflows.

foreignFields.name: tenant_id
foreignFields.description: Tenant that owns this OCR job, ensuring strict multi-tenant data isolation. Foreign key references creverse_ai_essay_tenants.id.

foreignFields.name: blob_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the essay blob (PDF or image) to process in this OCR job. Foreign key to creverse_ai_essay_essay_blobs.id.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current state of the OCR job such as 'queued', 'processing', 'succeeded', or 'failed'. Enables tracking and workflow management.

plainFields.name: error_message
plainFields.description: Optional detailed error message if OCR processing failed. Useful for troubleshooting and retry logic.

plainFields.name: started_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when OCR processing started. Null if processing not yet begun.

plainFields.name: finished_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when OCR processing completed. Null if job pending or failed.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this OCR job was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this OCR job was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp; null if not deleted.

models.name: creverse_ai_essay_ocr_results
models.description: OCR results contain extracted text from OCR jobs linked to specific essay versions generated by processing blobs. Each result record uniquely identifies the OCR job it belongs to and the resultant essay version. The model stores the plain text output, optional detected language, and timestamps for creation, updates, and soft deletion. This primary entity supports independent querying and management of OCR results in the essay processing pipeline.

foreignFields.name: ocr_job_id
foreignFields.description: Foreign key referencing the OCR job that generated this result. Links to creverse_ai_essay_ocr_jobs.id.

foreignFields.name: essay_version_id
foreignFields.description: Foreign key referencing the essay version created from this OCR text. Links to creverse_ai_essay_essay_versions.id.

plainFields.name: text
plainFields.description: Extracted OCR plain text content from essay blobs.

plainFields.name: language
plainFields.description: Detected or specified language of the OCR text such as 'en' or 'fr'. Facilitates language-based filtering and processing. Nullable if unknown.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the OCR result record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the OCR result record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp; null if not deleted.

models.name: creverse_ai_essay_reports
models.description: This table aggregates overall essay grading reports including progress, distribution, and cost governance metrics per tenant, class, and rubric over specified time ranges. It supports filtering by tenant, class, rubric, and time periods and enables efficient read access to analytic rollups for reporting purposes. The table maintains relationships to tenant, class, and rubric entities for scoping. Standard temporal fields track record creation and update times. This table is classified as primary as users query and browse report summaries independently.

foreignFields.name: tenant_id
foreignFields.description: Tenant of this report. {@link creverse_ai_essay_tenants.id}

foreignFields.name: class_id
foreignFields.description: Class related to report entries. {@link creverse_ai_essay_classes.id}

foreignFields.name: rubric_version_id
foreignFields.description: Specific rubric version referenced in the report. {@link creverse_ai_essay_rubric_versions.id}

plainFields.name: date_from
plainFields.description: Start date of the reporting period.

plainFields.name: date_to
plainFields.description: End date of the reporting period.

plainFields.name: total_essays
plainFields.description: Total number of essays included in this report.

plainFields.name: average_score
plainFields.description: Average normalized score (0-100 scale) across essays.

plainFields.name: cost_usd
plainFields.description: Reported cost of grading in USD for the period.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

models.name: creverse_ai_essay_report_snapshots
models.description: Historical snapshots of essay reports for audit trails and trend analysis. Each snapshot captures the state of a specific report at a point in time, preserving data immutability. The snapshots link to the main report entity and tenant. This table supports temporal queries for historical report comparisons and analytics. This is a snapshot table reflecting append-only audit data.

foreignFields.name: tenant_id
foreignFields.description: Tenant of this snapshot. {@link creverse_ai_essay_tenants.id}

foreignFields.name: creverse_ai_essay_report_id
foreignFields.description: Main report this snapshot refers to. {@link creverse_ai_essay_reports.id}

plainFields.name: snapshot_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the snapshot was taken.

plainFields.name: total_essays
plainFields.description: Total essays counted in this snapshot.

plainFields.name: average_score
plainFields.description: Average normalized score (0-100 scale).

plainFields.name: cost_usd
plainFields.description: Cost in USD at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

models.name: creverse_ai_essay_audit_logs
models.description: Audit logs capturing all user and system actions including PII access, changes to rubric, grading operations, and administrative activities. Tracks actor, action type, entity referenced, IP address, and timestamp, ensuring tenant isolation and compliance auditing.

foreignFields.name: tenant_id
foreignFields.description: Tenant associated with the audit log. {@link creverse_ai_essay_tenants.id}.

foreignFields.name: actor_user_id
foreignFields.description: User who performed the action, may be null for system events. {@link creverse_ai_essay_admin.id}.

plainFields.name: action
plainFields.description: Type of action performed, e.g., rubric_publish, grading_create, pii_access.

plainFields.name: entity_type
plainFields.description: Type of entity affected by the action, e.g., rubric_version, essay, user, feature_flag.

plainFields.name: entity_id
plainFields.description: UUID of the entity affected, if applicable.

plainFields.name: timestamp
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the action occurred.

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address from which action was performed, supports IPv4 and IPv6.

plainFields.name: details
plainFields.description: Optional JSON string with additional context or metadata about the action.

models.name: creverse_ai_essay_webhooks
models.description: Webhook configurations for delivering event notifications to external systems. Includes settings for destination URL, secret for signature validation, retry policies, and event filters. Tracks delivery status and error reasons.

foreignFields.name: tenant_id
foreignFields.description: Tenant owning the webhook configuration. {@link creverse_ai_essay_tenants.id}.

plainFields.name: url
plainFields.description: Destination endpoint URL for webhook delivery.

plainFields.name: secret
plainFields.description: Secret key for HMAC signature to verify webhook payload integrity.

plainFields.name: events
plainFields.description: Comma-separated list of event types that trigger this webhook, e.g., grading.completed, plagiarism.scanned.

plainFields.name: retry_count
plainFields.description: Number of retry attempts made after a failure.

plainFields.name: retry_delay_seconds
plainFields.description: Delay in seconds before the next retry attempt.

plainFields.name: last_error
plainFields.description: Last error message if delivery failed, null if no errors.

plainFields.name: active
plainFields.description: Indicates if the webhook is currently active and should receive events.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Webhook configuration creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last update to webhook configuration.

models.name: creverse_ai_essay_system_health
models.description: System health check records for tracking uptime and operational status metrics. Captures service names, health status, check timestamps, and optional detailed status information for monitoring and alerting.

plainFields.name: service_name
plainFields.description: Name of the monitored service or subsystem, e.g. grading_worker, webhook_dispatcher.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current health status (e.g., healthy, degraded, down).

plainFields.name: checked_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the health check was performed.

plainFields.name: details
plainFields.description: Optional JSON string with detailed health check information or metrics.

models.name: creverse_ai_essay_feature_flags_history
models.description: Historical records of feature flag changes capturing state over time, the author of the change, and reason for changes for audit and rollback capabilities.

foreignFields.name: feature_flag_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to current feature flag entity. {@link creverse_ai_essay_feature_flags.id}.

plainFields.name: changed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this change occurred.

plainFields.name: changed_by_user_id
plainFields.description: User who made the change. {@link creverse_ai_essay_admin.id}.

plainFields.name: previous_value
plainFields.description: Feature flag value before the change, stored as a JSON string.

plainFields.name: new_value
plainFields.description: Feature flag value after the change, stored as a JSON string.

plainFields.name: change_reason
plainFields.description: Text explaining the reason for the feature flag change.

models.name: creverse_ai_essay_cost_reports
models.description: This table captures cost and usage reports related to essay grading activities per tenant for specific time intervals. It records metrics such as token usage, latency, request counts, and cost amounts, enabling budget tracking and financial reporting within the multi-tenant system. It references the tenant entity and is indexed by tenant and report interval for efficient queries.

foreignFields.name: tenant_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the tenant entity. {@link creverse_ai_essay_tenants.id}.

plainFields.name: period_start
plainFields.description: Start timestamp of the reporting period in ISO 8601 format, inclusive.

plainFields.name: period_end
plainFields.description: End timestamp of the reporting period in ISO 8601 format, exclusive.

plainFields.name: token_count
plainFields.description: Total number of AI tokens consumed during this period for essay grading.

plainFields.name: request_count
plainFields.description: Total count of essay grading requests processed during this period.

plainFields.name: average_latency_ms
plainFields.description: Average latency in milliseconds for grading requests within this period.

plainFields.name: total_cost_usd
plainFields.description: Total cost in US dollars incurred during the reporting period related to grading activities.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last updated timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp to indicate if the record has been logically deleted.

models.name: creverse_ai_essay_auto_throttle_policies
models.description: This table defines auto-throttling policies that apply to tenants to control request rates and prevent budget overruns. It stores policy types, thresholds, and actions to enforce limits at runtime. Each policy is uniquely associated with a tenant and a policy type.

foreignFields.name: tenant_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the tenant which this throttle policy applies to. {@link creverse_ai_essay_tenants.id}.

plainFields.name: policy_type
plainFields.description: Type of throttling policy, such as 'budget_limit', 'rate_limit', indicating the enforcement scope.

plainFields.name: threshold_value
plainFields.description: Numeric threshold value for the policy, e.g., maximum allowed tokens per time unit or maximum request rate.

plainFields.name: action
plainFields.description: Action to take when the threshold is exceeded, e.g., 'reject', 'warn', or 'throttle'.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed human-readable explanation of the policy purpose and application.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this policy record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this policy record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp indicating logical deletion.
